headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SMITH, PHILIP BATTERMAN

snippet: SMITH--Philip Batterman. January 5, 1936, died January 29, 2016. He was beloved husband of Linda May and father to Susan, Elizabeth and Alice. Predeceased by his daughter Eleanor. Services 11am Tuesday, February 9 at St. Lukes Episcopal Church in Darien, CT. In Lieu of flowers, donations can be sent to Trinity-Pawling School in Pawling, NY. Elizabeth Smith Klein 1/3
lead_paragraph: SMITH--Philip Batterman. January 5, 1936, died January 29, 2016. He was beloved husband of Linda May and father to Susan, Elizabeth and Alice. Predeceased by his daughter Eleanor. Services 11am Tuesday, February 9 at St. Lukes Episcopal Church in Darien, CT. In Lieu of flowers, donations can be sent to Trinity-Pawling School in Pawling, NY. Elizabeth Smith Klein 1/3
